body_html: Yes, we are adding new features to TF and usually need to work on master. There are a few changes that went in recently that is fixing other issues that was blocking us. I can branch from before your changes and cherry-pick the fixes but that may cause bigger headaches when we merge back. If it takes you a long time to fix this, I might have to do this anyways. But I don't think the issue is StatusOr, it is template tuple return value optimization and thus will come up in other places as well. If I understood the discussion in the links above correctly, it looks like a gotcha in standard.

body: Yes, we are adding new features to TF and usually need to work on master. There are a few changes that went in recently that is fixing other issues that was blocking us. I can branch from before your changes and cherry-pick the fixes but that may cause bigger headaches when we merge back. If it takes you a long time to fix this, I might have to do this anyways. But I don't think the issue is StatusOr, it is template tuple return value optimization and thus will come up in other places as well. If I understood the discussion in the links above correctly, it looks like a gotcha in standard.
